node.doctext:
Set 'mobile' mode for this client. Sets a cookie. COOKIE!

[{openform}] [% my $mobile_cookie = $query->cookie('mobile'); my $mobile_param = $query->param('mobile'); if ($query->param('set')) { $USER->{cookie} = $query->cookie( -name=> 'mobile', -value=>$mobile_param || 0, -expires=>'+1y'); } else { $query->param('mobile', $mobile_cookie); } $query->checkbox(-name => 'mobile', -label => 'mobile') . $query->submit('set') . $query->end_form(); %]
node.title: set_mobile
